11111.content:
You and your cousin William, where stacking a tower of lego in his bedroom when suddenly you shrink to the size of a lego brick. You are so shocked by this event that you hide behind the nearest lego brick you see, so he can not see you.

What will you do now?
11111.title: He is a boy!

113.content:
You are Dan, 10 years old. Your cousin Rachel is 11 and has long brown hair. You and her often played together. Today was no different, as you stumbled and climbed over the different trees in the park. From your higher vantage point you noticed something in one of the bushes. "Hey what's that?" You leapt from your perch and took a look in the bush, thinking you'd found something cool.

You lifted it from the dirt. "An amulet." It fit nicely around your neck. Maybe you could sell it at a pawn shop and make a bit of money.

"Not as cool as mine!" Rachel said, now sporting an identical amulet. Identical, save for the fact yours was blue and hers was red. As you turned to her, as sudden light struck you from her amulet. Everything went red for a fraction of a second and then you looked around yourself. You were standing on a really big leaf. It was the size of a field to you. You realised that you had been shrunk!

"Dan? Dan? What happened? Oh my god, Dan! Is that you?"

Rachel's enormous face loomed like the moon, as she lifted the leaf to her face to inspect you. "You must have shrunk, you're like a speck! What are we gonna do?" She tilted the leaf to get a closer look at you. In doing so, she caused you to slide down the leaf. You were hurtling towards her face!

SPLAT!

You landed on something soft and wet. You slowly got to your feet and began to look around. You were in Rachel's mouth! "Rachel! I'm in your mouth!" Suddenly you felt her tongue starting to shift beneath you...
113.title: An Adventure Begins

1131.content:
...and the vision you saw now were nothing more then a tube of pink muscle and darkness. You realised what happened: rachel swallowed you whole! moment later, you were squeezed through the muscle sphincter and plopped down into the soft fleshy part of the stomach. You woke up slowly and looked around to see the vision. the pink wall were moving little and you could hear the gurgling and churning noise, but there were no food inside. you can't believe what happened now and had to give rachel an attention.

"I have to give rachel an attention." You said.

You then walked through the squishy organic floor toward the stomach wall and knocked few time, letting rachel feel you.

"Rachel! Can you feel my knocking!?" you shouted.

The stomach gurgled little and within minute..
1131.title: Inside the stomach

11311.content:
"Dan? are you ok?"

You heard rachels voice from afar. You were glad to hear that as stomach growled more, you saw the opening for the esphagus open. You then turned to the wall and shouted toward rachel.

"Rachel! can you vomit me out!?" you shouted.

"I'll try." Rachel replied.

Just then, a black fog appeared beneath you and from back an cloacked person with skull on its face appeared from the fog. You tried to turn around but for some reason, you felt chill from back and couldn't move. The person in black cloak came behind you and put its hand on your shouldr. It was an skeletal hand and you shivered.

"Mr.Dan, for your parents sinning for many crimes, you shall reape for their punishment by staying inside this stomach perminently." voice spoke.

You wondered what it ment until a black fog began to cover your body. You screamed for help but it was no good as the fog quickly covered the whole stomach area, it engulfed you as well. Outside the stomach, rachel was already in the bathroom to vomit you out until she felt the chill in her stomach and gurgled. She wondered what it was until she started to dose off and fell down. Inside the stomach, you felt the tremor as the world spun, you fell to the ground but was not hurt as you landed on the fleshy ground. The cloaked person floated as you slowly got up, you shouted at him.

"What are you talking about!? what do you mean, 'reaping'?" you shouted.

"Relax, young mortal. Since you are perminent residence in this domain, you are now an immortal. Nothing will hurt you, but you will never be able to come back out of this body." Cloaked person spoke.

"What about rachel?" You asked.

"I have cut off between you and the outside world." Person spoke, "Your parents, your friends..your niece have forgotten you..now, good day."

It then disappeared with the black fog. You shouted 'WAIT!' but it was too late. Just then, the world spun again, letting you know rachel woke. You called out her name and she...
11311.title: hearing

113111.content:
..She didn't listen to your shout! You were afraid of what that man said, as it was true. Moment later, the stomach suddenly growled and shifted, causing you to fall down on the fleshy ground. You could tell rachel was hungry, and within 20 minutes you heared gulping noise. From above you saw a chewed up pizza coming down from the esophagus toward the middle of the stomach. You quickly shifted yourself to the stomach wall, and see as the food goes down to the area.

"What should I do?" You said.

Just then, you heared the gurgling noise and noticed the stomach wall producing some sort of liquid. You quickly realised it was stomach acid as the tirade of water came down from esophagus, the landing area on your side were getting scarce. You becoming panic and quickly got on one of the mush. You floated on the mush and looked at the stomach acid as it was hard work on digesting the pizza.

"It looks disguisting..but beautifle.." You said.

Just then, another mush of pizza came down from esophagus, causing some wave and pushing you down to the pool of acid/water. You..
113111.title: Growling stomach

choices: Try to vomit you out again
113112.content:
“Dan? I hear you but can’t see you. The last thing I remember was picking up these weird amulets and suddenly I’m in the bathroom”
“I’m in your stomach. I think the grim reaper tried to trap me in here forever with this weird amulet. He shrank me on a leaf and when you picked it up I tripped and fell into your mouth. You tried to vomit me back up but it was unsuccessful. He also says that everyone has forgotten about me...”
“Really?” Responded Rachel. “We need to do something. I’ll contact your parents for help.”

After a few minutes you hear Rachel gasp about something and ask what’s wrong. “The grim reaper was right. No one remembers you except me.”
“What do we do?” You respond
“I’m not sure.” replies Rachel “But to start I’ll...”

All of a sudden this green, transparent, steamy liquid came from the walls of her stomach. Since Dan was 10 years old he didn't know what it was but he still panic not knowing what it was. He than knocked on the wall of Rachel's stomach wall even louder while avoiding this strange substance. He knocked louder and yelled louder.

RACHEL, RACHEL, RACHEL CAN YOU PLEASE ANSWER!!!

113122.content:
What Dan "Rachel said". What is this steamy liquid coming out of the walls of your stomach? That is my stomach acids.
Doesn't acids suppose to hurt "Dan said". Yes they do, do you feel okay Dan "Rachel said". Why isn't your stomach acids hurting me than.
I have no clue Dan.

Wait, maybe it has something to do with this ambulate I found in the bushes.
Dan went to inspect the ambulate a little more until he seen some writing on the back of it that said "Power of" on top of the back of the ambulate and on the bottom of the back of the ambulate it says "Indestructible". "Power of indestructible" it says.

Rachel, the reason I am not dying is because this ambulate is making me not die inside your stomach. Not what do we do now?
113122.title: What is it

You keep climbing despite how sticky and slippery it is. You can’t believe you are climbing the inside of your 11 year old cousin. You feel disgusted to be feeling the walls but you know you have a goal and that is not only to escape but be known as the first human to be inside a body and live. As you are climbing you come to a split decision on which direction to go as there are two side tunnels. On the one side Is the beating sound of her heart beating similar to that of a drum in a rock music video. On the other side is your cousins young not fully developed mammary glands.
11312211.title: Up the body

1142111121.content: "Stephen? Was that you? " I heard a faint "yes" while looking at my belly. "You did taste good in that sandwich I must say!"i giggled when i said that. I heard another faint response. "Get me out of here!"

Cindy finishes lunch and walks off to class.
1151.content:
It was a normal winter day at the local high school. You were having lunch in the main cafeteria with your cousin, Cindy. Cindy had long black hair, brown eyes, and was really skinny. While you were eating and having a good time, you both notice a shimmer in your food, as if it was from something shiny. You and Cindy pick the strange objects up.

"What is it?" you ask with curiosity.

"It looks like an amulet," Cindy said.

As soon as she said that, the amulets started to glow incredibly bright. You were blinded by the light and covered your eyes. When you opened them again, you realize that the world was absolutely huge, and that you were about half an inch tall. You landed right next to Cindy's lunch tray, and tried to get her attention. When she took notice of you, she took a closer look.

"It looks like a piece of food is trying to escape."

She didn't recognize you, as she picked you up and put you in her mouth. You were afraid of being chewed by her perfect teeth, but after her tongue moved you to the boulder-sized(to you) teeth and she chewed on you, you found that you were not harmed in any way. You realize that the amulets not only made you shrink, but also made you indestructible as well. That was a good thing, for the most part. You still had Cindy's stomach to look forward to.

You looked out of Cindy's mouth into the outside world and found out that you would never see it again. Cindy, after much chewing, eventually tilted her head back. You fell towards her throat, and tried to grab hold of something to stop yourself, but everything was much too slippery for you to get a good grip. You then heard a large GULP as you were swallowed by Cindy.

The ride down the throat seemed like minutes, the muscles pushing you down rhythmically. You finally reached the stomach and were deposited into the hot chamber. Since you were indestructible, the acids obviously don't harm you. You could hear Cindy talking to some friends on the outside, possibly wondering where you went.

Sadly, she will never know where you are, nor will anyone else. You help yourself to some food still in the stomach, despite the saliva coating. You decided to try to make the best out of the situation you were currently in. Since you seemed destined to live in Cindy's stomach for the rest of your life, you might as well make do with what you got.
1151.title: The Two Amulets

choices: You force your way back into her stomach, choosing to live there
You let her body slowly pull you into her intestines
11511.content:
Cindys stomach slightly swayed with the movement of her walking. You could hear her chatting away with people, her friends you assumed, somewhere up above. Because of that, you didnt expect pieces of food to start falling into the chamber of your new home.

The food had a sweet smell to it, and looked like some kind of white mush with tints of thick red flesh. After tasting it, you realized it was a red apple. Her stomach began partly filling up with the decently tasty mush, and as you sat back, some acid splashing on you, still leaving you unharmed, you realized that you could potentially live here. You would be fed, have a warm place to stay, and though you never acted on it, you did have a slight thing for your gorgeous cousin. Living inside ofher might not be a bad choice.

As you contemplated these ideas, her stomach lurches and you ended up sliding feet first to a tight hole of flesh near the lower wall of her stomach. It doesnt take you long to realize this leads to her intestines, and if youre not quick enough, you may end up on a very tight, very slow ride deeper inside of her.
11511.title: Cindy swallows more food for you to eat.

115111.content:
The choice is a no-brainer, you want to stay. You move your hands to the outer ring of her instestinal entrance and power push yourself back inside. You slip out and slide into her warm pool of acid and chyme. This really isnt bad. You can hear her breathing and heartbeat up above. And you assume she settled in for class as the movement of her walking stopped and you can vaguely hear a new voice droning on in a lecture style of talking.

"Well, my parents will be worried, and so will Cindy. To them, it must appear like I've disappeared."

As you think about their reactions, floating in the smooth soothing movements of her belly, you suddenly remember that you brough your phone with you. You pull it out and open it, the light for once fully illuminating the fleshy chamber you reside in. You could see the wavy pink walls slowly moving around you, along with the occasional leaking green acid dripping into the pond which you are floating in.

You search your contacts and find Cindys number. As you call her, the phone goes straight to voicemail. "Makes sense, she is in class afterall." You leave a message explaining in detail everything that happened. You explain to her that you're alright. You also tell her that you've decided to stay inside. It may seem weird, but you've always liked her more than family should, and this is your best way to stay with her. She'll occasionally feel you inside, amd know you're still with her.

You end the message and go back to floating inside her gastric fluids. Your phones battery slowly declines, but before it reaches 0, you get a reply from her. "Ok... silly weirdo. :p" As the phone dies, putting you back into the semi darkness, you settle in and close your eyes for a quick nap while surrounded by your cousins inteenal ambience.

This is your home.
115111.title: You force your way back into her stomach, choos...

You are 1/4 of an inch tall
11531.content:
Your name is Matthew, 19, a recent graduate from highschool. You moved to the city which you attens college at to live with your cousin Rebecca. Rebecca is a 24 year old talented physics major who is aspiring to be a researcher. A fact made obvious from the many times she passionately raved about two old amulets she found that emit a unique magnetic aura that she managed to replicate into pills... yada yada.

Anyway, as you wake up for another day at college, you walk down to the kitchen table where your breakfast is. You can hear your cousin in the shower. She was kind enough to leave your medicine next to your plate, which helps you digest food when you wake up. You take the pill and settle in for your breakfast. After eating the delicious french toast for a bit, you begin to notice the world growing around you at an alarming rate. You get dizzy and pass out while holding onto the table.

choices: You shout and try to get her attention
You stay paralyzed with fear and shock
115311.content:
You don't know how long youve been passed out, but one thing you do know, the world around you is huge! The table stretches on for what seems like miles. You have your plate of food next to you, ans your cousins plate on the very far side. Speaking of the devil, you can feel the ground shake and hear her thunderous steps resounds as she walks into the kitchen. As she walks by your seat, you climb on your plate to shout and get her attention, you slip and land into a pool of syrup and powdered sugar. "I guess Matthew already left to go to class." You hear your cousin lightly chuckle. "That cute kid always had a problem with eating all his breakfast."

She grabs your plate and lifts it into the air. By the time you steady yourself to see where she is taking you, the plate tilts and you fall on to a soft surface, a sticky piece of bread, while a smalle piece falls on you. As you are stuck, your cousin begins eating her meal, and much to your dread, you are on the piece she picks up. As her mouth looms before you...
115311.title: You wake up on the table, an inch tall

choices: You stare at her throat, entranced
You bolt forward with all your strength
1153112.content:
Your moment of hesitation ended quickly as you were thrust into a warm, wet chamber. Between the swaying tongue and crushing teeth, it was difficult to maintain your footing, and many times you nearly fell onto her teeth.

Eventually there was a break in her chewing, and by then any remnant of syrup on you was replaced with her saliva. You couldnt tell how much of it you swallowed, but youre sure that her juices now made up a majority of your stomachs contents, the faint taste of her toothpaste and syrup lingering in your mouth.

As you recollect yourself, you notice that you have been slowly moving to the back of her throat. If you hesitate now, you will be swallowed. The time to act is now...
1153112.title: You stay paralyzed with fear and shock

choices: This could be you! You need to get her attention
11531121.content:
Unfortunately, that one moment of hesitation was all that it to determine your fate. With a mighty gulp, you were pushed into a tight, fleshy tunnel and massaged and constricted as you were slowly forced down. "Mmmmm, that was delicious!" You could feel the vibrations of your cousins words as she spoke "It also helps that this was the same food Matthew ate abit of." As she said that, you got a weird glimpse into a side of your cousin you never knew was there. You could only contemplate this as the tightness of her throat left it hard for you to catch your breath. With each inhale, the constriction of her throats peristaltic movement squeezed the air out of you. You began thinking that you would end up crushed in this fleshy tunnel, when you felt your feet touch a small, ribbed opening beneath you. You felt it expand slowly as you were forcefully pushed in, along with the food above you.

With a splash, you land in a warm pool of gooey liquid. You can barely make out a large pool of fluid, with the occasional mound of food in the gloom of Rebeccas belly. The bolus of food that was behind you in her throat finds its way in, landing in the pool and narrowly missing you. It nearly drags you under and you begin swimming to the outer edge of her stomach.

You pick up the pace as you begin to feel your body burn as the acid nibbles away at you with a sizzle. You make it to the edge where the acid meets her stomachs flesh and you sit to process the situation youre in. You get accostomed to the gloom, and can begin to fully make out the bubbling lake ahead of you. You can see the mounds of food she ate slowly sinking in, being broken down and turned into energy for her body.

It was in this moment you realize...
11531121.title: You stare at her throat, entranced

choices: You know, its not really bad in here. I think i will stay
115311212.content:
You feel yourself up and down. The burning pain from the acid is gone! In fact... your skin feels smooth again, like you were never burned. Curious, you decide to slide to the edge of her acid pool and dip your hand in. The burning begins again right away, but never get worse, it actually feels good in a strange way. You stay like this for what feels like minutes, and then pull your hand out. Your hand feels rough from the acid, but quickly becomes smooth again.

"I... am healing very quickly. How..."
The pill... Your cousin had to have gottem your medication and her pills switched somehow... Because not only are you small, but apparently you cant be digested. You heal way too fast. Next you begin to submerge yourself into her acids. They begin eating you at first, dissolving your clothes, but the burning remains mild, and begins to feel very pleasant. Like a mild erotic pain. "This is weirs... wait what am I thinking?" You scramble back to the edge of her stomach.
"I was willingly letting myself be digested, even though I wont die."

You calm yourself down and think. The gurgling and groaning of her stomach were the only noises besides her steady heartbeat and occasional breathing. It was almost relaxing, but you had a choice to make. You could either stay in here, or explore and find a way out...
115311212.title: your body no longer hurts...

1153112121.content:
"I really am becoming weird." You thought as you chose to settle down inside Rebeccas stomach. You picture her fit, voluptuous body, curly brown hair and perfect bespectacled face. "I wonder what she would think if she knew I was in here." You thought of your memories with her. It always seemed like she was attached to you when you both were younger. When she was a teen, she would hang out with you when your parents were out, and even recently she let you stay at her apartment for free while you went to college. In retrospect, she was always close to you, and it seemed she had abit of a complex for you.

It seems like she rubbed off on me in the end." You muttered, amid the soothing groans of her belly. Every slight movement rocking you back and forth, causing the chyme of her stomach to recede and surge like the ebb and flow of the ocean. Her breathing and heartbeat were a lullaby to you, and you decide to lay back and let the acid carry you in. By now, the burning felt good, causing occasional goosebumps of pleasure. This was your home now. You were where you belonges...

Inside the stomach of your beautiful cousin.
1153112121.title: You know, its not really bad in here. I think i...

11531121211.content:
Rebeccas POV: It has been 20 years since Matthew disappeared. The first 10 years were torture. He was gone. My aunt and uncle freaked out, working with detectives, filing missing person reports, all to no avail. I tried everything to help. I talked to people at my graduate school, made connections at research institutes, but nothing ever turned up. I wore myself ragged looking for him. I would never admit it, but I love him, more than I should, feelings that only grew with time, especially after he moved in.

It was 10 years ago when I began to notice, i looked like i havent aged a day. I thought it was weird how I didn't have a single gray hair or wrinkle after all that worrying. To take my mind off of my worries, i began looking into it. What I found out astonished me, and reignited my passion. My cousin was alive. Actually, he was shrunk, and currently living inside my stomach. Somehow, because of it I wasnt aging, and from my tests neither was he. Matthew was living insidd my stomach. I could feel him when he moved. I could talk to him, though I could never hear his reply. Thinking about it was exciting. I could be with him, live with him. My beloved cousin was alright, and he was in a place where i could keep him forever.

"Our life together is only just beginning, Matthew."
11531121211.title: 20 year timeskip

11532.content:
It's been five days after your grandfather had died and today was the day of the funeral. He was a fun guy to hang with and you two sure made some fun memories together when you were a kid. Because of his odd behaviour, not many relatives came, except for you, your cousin, and the relatives that hope to gain something from his will. It was amazing that you took a day off from your busy workplace, but there wasn't work to do at the moment and the boss accepted your leave of absence. The funeral went on for a long time and eventually, everyone went outside so they can bury him. Once again, they had everyone say their piece, which went by quickly, and they began to bury him. You don't remember what you said, probably not important, and everything afterwards, as you find yourself stuck inside the office of an attorney with everyone present, minus the priest.
"So, what did his will say in short?" One of your aunts(?) asks, as the lawyer takes out his files and searches through them.
"Seeing how everyone just got back from a funeral, I'll go through as quickly as I can, so you can grieve properly at home," he says, oblivious to the others' lack of care and heighten greed they show off their faces.
"The vultures will probably get nothing, knowing Gramps!" An all too familiar voice you know too well, quietly whispers to you, snickering at her comment.
That voice belongs to your cousin, Shelly, whom you disliked, even as a kid. She was a tomboy and loved making you squirm, by eating gross things in front of you and gassing with her emissions. She was a stick back then, despite being older than you by three years, but over the years, she fatten up to bear large breasts, butt, and her trademark gut, which was straining her clothes. She was beautiful back then and even now, most people would gawk at her for her beauty, even at the age of 29. Besides you, she was the one that cared for her grandpa the most.
Hearing both yours and Shelly's name being called, you both perk up and are given two amulets. Both were big, heavy lumps of reddish metal and quite ugly, the only difference being the color of the gem, a dark violet with one while the other was a sickening shade of orange. Accepting as his gift of inheritance, you both take it, yours the orange one while Shelly's was the violet one, and the lawyer announces that was all there was, Grandfather Peter's home being sold to cover his debts while he had nothing else of value.
"Are you sure that's all?"
"Positive, and now, if you excuse me, I have to deal with a woman suing her cat for embezzlement from her husband's company," he answers, rushing out to deal with his next client.
Enraged, they all leave, glaring at you two until it was just you two alone. You prepare to go home, but Shelly stops you.
"Come on, Rick! Don't be like that! If it's about the past, how'll we forge..."
"Easy for to say, when you're the one who was doing the raping, when I asked multiple times for it to stop and nobody believed me when I told them that afterwards! It nearly ruined my life!" You retorted, trying to control your anger, and again, you try to leave.
"Let's just visit his home, for his sake. Please!" The fat woman pleads with you, begging you with her puppy eyes, that still work.
"Fine, but after this, I'll never see you again, got it?" You said, Shelly nodding her head, and the both of you leave the funeral home leave, unaware of the gems faintly glowing in your grasp.

When do you shrink?
11532.title: The Funeral

12.content: What ages are you two
12.title: ages

choices: You shrunk to three inches tall.
You shrunk to an inch tall.
You shrunk to a quarter of an inch tall.
121.content:
"Emily, come an' look at this!!" Your cousin, Connor, shouted at you from deep in the forest. You fumbled through the brush, following the sound of his voice, your long, braided hair thumping against your back.

You and Connor had deeply entwined history together, even for your brief years of life. For starters, you and Connor were born on exactly the same day. Your first birthday was the day Connor was born. You were seven now, Connor six. He and your uncle and aunt lived just down the road from yours, so you were always coming over to one another's houses to play. You trick-or-treated together, celebrated Christmas and Easter together. You shared birthday parties. You even went to the same pre-school. Suffice it to say that, even though Connor had some habits that got on your nerves, the two of you were tight. It was almost as if you were destined to stay together.

Today, you were playing "forest explorers." Connor's backyard was part of a thick forest of trees; it was your favorite place to play even if your parents were always concerned about the two of you getting lost. You hopped over fallen logs and ducked under branches, venturing deeper into the woods, to the place where you heard Connor's voice. He was always calling after you to show you something interesting, usually an exotic bug or snail he'd found. (He would generally proceed to eat said bug, just to gross you out.)

"Emily, look, look!" You came upon him crouched over the big, hollowed-out stump of an oak tree. "I found real treasure!! Look!!"

"I don't believe you," you said, but your voice trailed off as you peeked over the edge of the stump and saw, in its depths, two glowing jewels. One glinted a fiery red; the other's cool blue hue reminded you of the sky on a sunny day. You reached in, grasping for the gems, but as you felt around inside, your fingers wrapped around fine silvery chains. They were amulets, meant to be worn. "Woah," you marveled as you held them up; even the gems' metal setting and chains gleamed coolly in the verdant light that filtered down from the leaves above.

"Aren't they neat!" Connor was practically bouncing up and down in excitement.

"Should we show them to our parents?" you asked. You were always the more reserved, practical one of the two of you.

"Heck no!! These are gonna be our secret treasure!! They'll be like, our buddy charms!!" His grubby hand darted toward yours and abruptly he yanked the red amulet out of your hand. "This is the one I want!!" Of course he'd go for the red one; red was his favorite color. He threw it around his neck and let it dangle against his chest. You always preferred blue, yourself, so you had no problems with this arrangement.

But when you slipped the blue amulet's chain around your neck, a strange reaction occurred. Connor's amulet started to glow, casting a hot red light over the both of you. You opened your mouth to speak, but within the blink of an eye, the gleam of the amulet turned blinding. "Con--"

A ray shot out from Connor's chest, refracting against your own, blue amulet. The sheer force of the radiant blow knocked you to the ground. Your vision went dark.

Your eyes fluttered, and you slowly stirred to consciousness. When you pushed yourself up from the ground, you realized something was terribly wrong. You were laying against a huge maple leaf... And the giant shadow of your cousin loomed over you.

(Just how small had you shrunk down to be?)
121.title: Discovery of a strange treasure.

choices: He stuffs you into his pocket to take you home. You'll deal with all this later.
Your parents can't know about this... He has to dispose of the evidence!
He suddenly relaxes and smiles--a mischievous smile.
1212.content:
A gigantic hand scoops you up off the ground where you lay; you realize you fit snugly into its palm, making you more or less an inch tall. You think. You didn't get to the "measuring" unit in school yet.

A powerful sense of vertigo brings the taste of bile into your throat and sets your head a-spin as you're lifted up; you close your eyes, letting it come and pass. When you open your eyes again, you are face-to-face with your cousin's... well... face. His mouth is slightly agape as he looks at you, his warm breath washing over you when he exhales. He inhales and you can feel the rush of air against your body as it's sucked into his mouth. When he speaks his voice is small, tight and scared, even though it's deafening to you: "Did... did I do this...?"

You curl up in Connor's hand, clutching at the amulet around your neck. It's still warm with residual heat from the blast. It sets in--this is real. This isn't just a dream. "I-I think you did," you say slowly. "Or, I guess, we both did it."

Connor's lip quivers; his wide eyes are watery. "I didn't m-mean to!!"

You hold your hands out, rushing to reassure him. "No no, Connor, it's ok! Don't--don't cry. Ok? I'm ok, see, I'm not hurt at all!" You stand up shakily on the soft surface of his palm, doing a little pirouette. "Ta-da! I'm fine!"

This seems, briefly, to reassure him, but his eyebrows furrow, as other concerns run through his mind. Perhaps the same ones running through yours. Is there any way to change you back? Or are you stuck like this? Forever? How are you supposed to live when you're the size of a bug, and as small and fragile as one? Being a tiny person sounds like fun in storybooks, but right now you're just scared.

(Of course, neither of you has any inkling of the amulets' true power or purpose...)
1212.title: At a giant boy's mercy.

choices: You're so lost in thought you fall off the counter and into a cheerios box
You fall into a glass of milk.
12121.content:
You look up at the giant still taking in his massive saize.

You: So uh Connor buddy wanna do the thing and make me bigger?

Connor: Ugh, this is to much, I'll think about it later.

You:What do you mean la-

You were suddenly cut off by Connor encasing you in his palm then realese you into his pocket. You don't know exactly what happened next because you saw nothing however felt alot of pounding. It didn't help that every step Connor took felt like an earthquake. Then the pounding stopped and once again you were encased in flesh as Connor picked you up. He placed you on the counter and sinply said

Connor: I'm gonna to pee real quick, eat some cheerios, then I'll help you.

You: WAIT CONNOR DON'T

Connor mid sentence left you on the counter, needless to say you were left with mixed emotions, for one Connor should have grown you back already. But then again he is planning to help you still. But then again Who knows when that will be he's a boy, their so immature. These back and forth emotions continued until....
12121.title: He stuffs you into his pocket to take you home....

choices: Connor picks you up with the spoon
You dodge until there are no more cheerios and Connor sees you
121211.content: Then while you're so deep in thought about whether you're mad at Connor or not you clumsily fall off the cpunter and into a box of cheerios. Now you definitely knew who you were angry at, yourself. You don't worry to much though because a childish ss Connor is he wouldn't just forget about you. You just sat their thinking for a but till you heard a flush, then you once again heard pounding or Connor's footsteps. Then you feel the box you're in move a bit, then suddenly it was tilted over and you came pouring out into a bowl. Luckily Connor is one of the weird people who pours the milk first, otherwise you would have died upon impact of the bowl. But now here you are just floating in a bowl full of cereal. You look up to Connor expecting a concerned face or a face that is looking for you, but to your unfortunate suprise, it didn't, Connor's face was one of Hunger. You then look to see Connor's massive hand come with a spoon, you watch in horror as that spoonful of cheerios is brought to Connor's face and instantly divoured. The spoon then came back down and brought another spoonful, a few times it gets close to you, but you're a pretty good swimmer so you can escape. Until...
121211.title: You're so lost in thought you fall off the ...

choices: Connor's amulet begins to glow, and as does yours (saved for now)
1212111.content:
You were getting quite proud of yourself, you had dodged so many spoons you thought you were getting pro, then you started making a game out of it and tried to get as close as possible to the spoon with getting caught, it was all fun and games until you found yourself in the middle of the spoon, with no escape, dispite all your attempts to swim out, it fell on deaf ears. You watch as Connor's massive mouth opened. You could see every detail of his mouth including his previously crushed up cheerios. A voice in the back of you head whispered

"That's gonna be you in a few seconds."

You then watched as your little cousin, the lne who looked up to you, the who you played with, the one who you had fun with, lifted the spoon into his mouth. Darkness ecased you and Connor's saliva threw you around. Luckily you able to escape getting chewed but it only delayed the inevitable, because Connor then swallowed and all the crushed cheerios were forced into his stomach along with you.

Connor then licked his lips.

Connor: Man that bowl was really good.

He then rubbed and patted his belly, he giggled because his stomach growled. Connor then finished his bowl and looked around for you and couldn't find you.

Connor: Where could she be?
1212111.title: Connor picks you up with the spoon

choices: You make him throw you up
12121111.content: Connor swallowed you whole and you fall in his stomach but don't die you fall on a French fry
12121111.title: The end for you?

choices: Your amulet is glowing... It's protecting you from being digested!
Without the red amulet nearby, yours is useless. You're starting to feel tingly.
12122.content:
"A-aunt Jen is gonna kill me when she finds out what happened to you... and M-mom..." His hand is shaking. You drop into a crouch, curling up for dear life, not wanting to fall to the ground below. (Little do you realize that's the last thing you should be afraid of.)

You shake your head. "Connor. No. We've gotta tell our parents. Maybe they'll figure out a way to fix--"

"I'll get in so much trouble! I'll get spanked! I'll get grounded from playing with you ever again! Mommy will take away all my toys!!" His eyes bug out in his panic. "M-maybe they'll kick me out of the whole family! I'll be an orphan and have to live on the streets!! It's all my fault!!"

"Why would you get kicked outta the family?" you cry out, trying to reason with him. You pound on his hand--but you don't expect the retaliation you receive. His hand suddenly closes around you tightly. In the tight, hot enclosure of his dirt-covered hand, you kick and flail. "Mmmph! Lemme out!!"

Connor is breathing heavily; you peer through the cracks in his hand and see him, with his free hand, taking off the amulet. He spins it in his hand by the chain and lets it sail through the woods--in a flash, it is gone; a gleam in the distance and then no more as the forest swallows it. You scream. "Connor!!"

"I-I don't have to tell 'em what happened!!" He looks down into his hand at you, his eyes gleaming with a strange light. You instinctively know his intent.

"Connor! No!!!"

His hand rushes up toward the black, gaping hole of his mouth, and you are thrown onto the hot, spongy surface of his tongue. You struggle, but his tongue fights back, curling and squeezing around your body. His hot, smelly saliva slathers you. What light beams into this dark, hot cave peeks through the cage of his crooked baby-teeth--but even this light disappears as his lips close. You feel gravity shift around you. It's all happening so fast--no. No. "No! Please! NO!!!"

You tumble into a dark, cramped space. Muscles seize you, crushing your body tightly, and you're sucked down to the tune of a deafening *GULP*.

The trip down his gullet is at once ages long, and only seconds. You can't breathe in the suffocating embrace of his throat. Let alone move. You try to scream, but as you slip deeper into his body, surrounded by the frenetic hammering of his heart, you realize you're never going to be heard. And then--all of a sudden--it's over. You drop into a waist-high pool of viscous slime. In the darkness you only realize what it is by the smell. Connor's lunch--peanut butter and banana sandwiches. Pulverized to unrecognizability by the pushing, shifting, gurgling walls of your surroundings. Connor's stomach. You push against the goo-coated wall. This is really Connor's stomach. Your own cousin swallowed you alive, and no one but him will ever know. You're a prisoner inside his belly.
12122.title: It's the perfect crime.

choices: He thinks you'll just be digested, and forgets about you.
He's well aware you're trapped alive inside him.
121221.content:
A light starts to flicker in the dark. It is muted at first, but you recognize its source. You lift up the amulet around your neck and manage to shake some of the digestive goo off of your amulet. The light grows clearer, a pure, bright blue.

With its light, you can see your surroundings. It refracts off the slime coating and dripping from the moving walls; under the slime, you can see dark veins darting through the pinkish surface. You now have a decent idea of your prison's size--relative to you, it is about the size of your bedroom at home. Or maybe, you think grimly to yourself, it could be described as the size of a jail cell--considering that as far as you can tell, there's no way out of here. It reeks, so bad. A huge rush of rank air hits your nose, the belly around you contorting, and a powerful, gaseous belch echoes in your ears. It settles, and you can hear him breathing, his heart beating.

Your surroundings start to shake as Connor sets off for his house at a jog. He has the perfect alibi--he can just tell his parents that you got lost in the woods playing hide-and-seek. Not his fault. You're the elder one, the one who's supposed to look after HIM, not the other way 'round. Your parents will be shaken, but they'll move on, and Connor will be able to go on with his life as normal... with you imprisoned inside.

As for Connor...
121221.title: An inside view of your coz.

choices: His parents know hes not telling the truth.
1212212.content: "All i have to do is say that,We were playing hide and seek and you got lost." He said his voice vibrating off his stomach walls. You could here his footsteps, as he approached the home.The door opened and adult chatter was heard but stopped."Hi conner listen bud oh uh where's Emily?" You heard your dad speak."Emily and I were playing in the woods when she ran away a,nd i couldn't find her" You,r mother gasped "He.....HE IS LYING" She leapt out off her seat and threw herself at her husband."He is lying he knows something about my babay girl and he's not telling the truth!!!!!!!!!!" Bob...." Listen James your son better fess up my wife knows every lie i've ever told since our honeymoon and when someone lies she's like a lie detector".
1212212.title: He's well aware you're trapped alive in...

choices: Connor didn't hear you... you're toast!
Connor heard you... he's going back into the forest!
121222.content:
Your eyes had adjusted to the darkness, yet as you got a better view, it didn't make the situation look any better.

You were trapped in your cousin's stomach, here with pulverized piles of mush that was one his peanut butter and banana sandwiches, slowly submerging into the fluid. The sloshing of Connor's stomach made it hard for you to stand your ground, the undulating of his curvy stomach walls knocking the contents around, swirling it and stirring it into his digestive sacs. You never felt so scared, what becoming a snack for Connor, hoping that you would be erased from this world by swallowing you, digesting you, and making him a part of his growing body. In short, you were in an acidic hell.

Speaking of hell, unfortunately, you started to feel a sensation. A tingly sensation running through your legs, one that also began to burn. The stomach started to gurgle and groan, agitating the liquid, making it bubble that increased the tingling and burning, and soon you started to scream. You were being digested by your cousin!

"Help! Connor, help!" you cried, trudging through the acid as you made your way to the stomach walls, and began pounding it. "Connor, please help me! I'm being digested! Please, you have to let me out! I don't wanna stay here! I wanna live!"

Another groan shook the interiors of the stomach. The acids began to rise, slowly making it up to your belly, making you scream bloody murder and frantically pound his stomach walls. "Connor please! I don't wanna be digested! Please, don't digest me! I don't wanna die!"
121222.title: Imminent Digestion

1212221.content:
You fall asleep...














And never wake up again.
1212221.title: Connor didn't hear you... you're toast!

12123.content:
You were starting to feel better as Connor calmed down, as Connor was composing himself you were in his hand still getting used to your surroundings, the more you thought the madder it made, you were such a better kid than Connor, more mature why'd SHE have to shrink. Connor on the other hand had calmed down you looked up to see his face, he really was a cute kid, hard to get mad at. In fact you realized that basically had a perfect body.

Then Connor looks down at you, with a smile on his face. Then he giggled.

You:This can't be good. Hey Connor hurry up and unshrink me!!!

Then to your suprise Connor didn't answer with "yes" or "ok" but instead with

Connor: Nope

You: What!!!! Connor unshrink me right now.

Connor: Rember that prank you pulled on me where you ate my sandwich that I made.

You didn't like where this was going.

You: Um yea....

Connor: I never got back at you, this is the perfect time.

You were about to reply but Connor cupped his hands together so you couldn't do anything.

Connor: Huh what should I do? I could um uh, well, uh.

Connor was about to give up when he heard is tummy rumbling.

Connor: That's a great idea, she ate my sandwhich so I eat her, that's fair.

Connor opened his hands and you hoped ge was joking about getting back at you, but Connor had that look of mischief. Without saying anything he held you up by your shirt, tilted his head back, a d opened his mouth nice and big.

You: Connor what on Earth are you doing!!!

Connor: I'm gonna eat you
He said while rubbing his belly.

You: No Connor don't do that, please im sorry c'mon don't do this....
12123.title: He suddenly relaxes and smiles--a mischievous s...

choices: Playing with his cousin in his belly.
Going about like any other day.
121231.content:
"Sorry, but you eat my sandwich, you'll just have to be lunch."

Connor tilted his head back, leaving his mouth wide open as a playful "aaahhhhh" escaped his mouth. You wriggled frantically to escape his grasping fingers but your cousin's grip was too hard for you to break free. It didn't matter anyway because Connor was already lowering close to his open mouth. "Connor! No! Stop! Ahhh!"

Connor dropped you onto his tongue and closed his teeth and his lips behind you, trapping you in darkness. Using his tongue, Connor bounced you over the inside of his mouth, squishing you against the roof of his mouth, against his cheeks and his teeth, sucking on you and enjoying your flavor. You screamed, but was cut off when his saliva entered your mouth alongside Connor's moans of pleasure at your taste. Then, lifting his tongue, you went sliding down to the back of Connor's throat. He opened his mouth one more time so you could see the last view of daylight you would ever see.

"Connor! No! NOOOOO!"

GLURK!

Connor's esophagus muscles grabbed your feet and dragged you down his throat, the sensation making him moan again. You screamed as the muscles squeezed you on all sides, suffocating you so much you couldn't scream. After a short time, you felt your feet kick in the open air, then you were dropped into the cavernous pit of your little cousin's stomach. You splashed down in a thick, murky liquid that was warm to the touch, and his stomach gurgled upon your arrival. A rush of air erupted up Connor's threat and out of his mouth, making him giggle as he rubbed and pat his tummy.

"Now you're going to stay in there until you've learned your lesson," Connor said playfully, patting his tummy one more time before...
121231.title: Down the hatch

1212311.content:
Connor giggles as an idea comes to him. You certainly feel good down there, and he isn't quite sure that you'll ever learn your lesson, so to speak. He takes his rather plump tummy in both hands and jostles it up and down a bit, wanting to feel you bounce around. He gets his wish, as you suddenly feel yourself being thrown around, bouncing off the walls and getting coated in even more disgusting slime. "Connor! Stop that!"

"Nu-uh," he says, a cruel smile on his face. "You're just a toy for my tummy now. Hope you enjoy it as much as I do!"
1212311.title: Playing with his cousin in his belly.

choices: ...unless you try and plan an escape.
...so you'll have to resign yourself to living inside your cousin's stomach.
12123111.content:
You didn't know how long were you trapped in your cousin's stomach. You were starting to lose perception of time, something that Connor has plenty of now that he had disposed of you the only way he did. The playful little giant took advantage of your size by swallowing you whole, and all because you ate his lunch! Okay, that one was on you, but still, eating you the way he did was taking it too far! Even if it was a joke, this wasn't funny!

While you were lamenting your plight, you heard the distinct sound of swallowing right above where you were. Just as you turned your head up to see what it was, you were met with masticated food splattering all over your face. It smelled like Connor's spit, there was also peanut butter and banana mixed in with it. Connor must've made himself a peanut butter and banana sandwich! You screamed as two more big bites filled up what little space you had in Connor's stomach. You waded over to the stomach wall and pounded on it.

"Connor, please stop! Stop eating while I'm here! It's so disgusting, I'm gonna throw up!"

But Connor's only response was a little giggle as he patter his belly, bumping you back into the growing marshy mess of his digestive acids and melting food. "Sorry, tummy toy! Guess I shoulda told ya I was hungry first! Hey, at least you'll be able to eat while you're down there!"

You dry heaved at the thought of eating what your cousin ate. "Oh, by the way, I'm having milk with my sandwich so you might wanna hold your breath for a bit. Here you go!"

Suddenly, you heard the sound of multiple gulps as Connor drank his milk straight from the glass. Just as you swam away from the stomach sphincter, you were splashed down into the liquid with enough milk to fill seven, maybe eight gallon jugs your size! You swam up to the surface and coughed and gagged. The stomach walls pulsed as it released a belch of mighty air up your cousin's throat and out of his mouth. You felt your liquid prison jostle as he patted his belly again.

"Ahh~ that was filling!" your cousin said oh-so-innocently to himself. "I hope you enjoy your lunch, buggy. I wouldn't want you to go hungry now, would i?"

At that point, starvation, drowning, or dehydration was more preferable than this torture. You felt emotionally deflated, the trauma of your misfortune finally taking its tool. You wished for death, but at the same time, you wished to live. To Connor, you were nothing now, nothing but a tiny toy your cousin swallowed whole to keep in captivity inside his growing body. You were trapped in the young boy's stomach, and there was nothing you can do now...
12123111.title: He keeps eating

121232.content:
Connor found it in his heart to forgive you, he got his amulet and Unshrunk you.




Congratulations you got the forgiving ending
121232.title: Connor forgives you

choices: A speck of something, unsure about eating it but leaning towards yes
122.content:
You, a 9-year-old girl named Megan, were visiting your cousin, an 8-year-old boy named Joey, at his house, when his dad (your uncle) gave you two a box of toys to play with. Inside the box, mysteriously, were two amulets, one blue and one red. You take the blue one because it's your favorite color and he obviously gets the red one. Joey takes a bite of his sandwich on a plate next to him, gulping it down quickly as he examined his new toy. *BUUUURRRRPPP* Joey let out a loud, digusting belch. You always hated when he burped like that, and the fact that he was bigger than you despite being younger. He also would eat just about anything edible he could get his hands on, even some things that weren't edible, which you found absolutely disgusting.

When you put your amulet on, so did Joey, and the two reacted to having human possessors as they were built to do. The blue one was built to make the wearer indestructible and completely invulnerable to physical pain, but the red one...the red one gave a much different power...

The red amulet glowed with a brilliant light, unlike the blue one, which kept a soft brightness about it. Joey bragged about it to you. "Mine glows more than yours! Ha ha ha!" He pointed the jewel of the amulet in your face, and activated its mysterious power...


You wake up in what appears to be a sea of giant carpet fibers. Because it is a sea of giant carpet fibers. They go up to about your waist, so your face is completely unobstructed in viewing the colossal, towering body of Joey, trying to find you after you disappeared when he shoved the red amulet at you.

His giant bare feet stomp closer to you, and the glow of his amulet reveals you to him, except, he thinks that you are...
122.title: Given the Amulets

choices: Joey shows someone else the amulet
You sit back as Joey takes a nap
1222.content:
"Ooh, at least this thing lets me see bugs better!" Joey picked you up between his thumb and index finger, and brought you to his face. "Mmm, it looks tasty..." He turned to what was left of his sandwich and got an idea.

Sitting back down, Joey removed the top piece of bread and dropped you from a lethal height down onto whatever meat was on his sandwich, you couldn't tell at your size. Because you retained your amulet (seeing as it shrunk with you), you were unharmed but immensely terrified from the fall. You got up and realized that your amulet must save you from feeling pain or dying, and that the two are meant to work together.

"Bye bye, bug!" Joey put the bread back, picked up the large piece of sandwich, and shoved it in his mouth. It was very warm inside, and his chewing freed you from being trapped. You fell onto his saliva-coated tongue and quickly too were covered in wet, sticky saliva. In his ravenous chewing with his mouth open, you got quick glimpses of his bedroom (where you were the whole time before he ate you) and realized that was the last you would ever see of the real world. Your hand got caught under one of Joey's massive teeth as he swished his food around and chewed it for the last few times, but of course, you weren't hurt at all and Joey just thought that the hard thing he felt between his teeth was your "bug shell."

You screamed for dear life as he pushed the mashed-up food and you to the back of his throat, and then, *GULP*, you were sent on a one-way trip down into the boy's stomach.

*GUUURRRGGLLE* Joey's belly rumbled as you and the food were deposited into his cavernous stomach, full of a soupy mixture of his past bites of sandwich, and stomach acid. You fell right in and struggled to swim back up to the surface. You were surprised to find that you weren't affected by the burning acids or even the horrible smell inside your cousin's stomach, but then quickly realized it was the amulet at work once again.

Taking advantage of the situation as best you could, you waded over to a semi-solid piece of...something and sat on it, watching gas bubbles rise up from the lake (the amulet gave off great glow now, after being set in use).

*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP* "Ahh..." Joey burped and patted his stomach. "I hope you're having a nice time in there, bug!" Joey spoke to his tummy, specifically to his special snack, and rubbed his belly thinking about the bug digesting.

But the bug was not digesting at all. In fact, you found it weirdly relaxing, sitting on that slowly-digesting thing and watching Joey's food digest, listening to the loud rumbles and growls of his stomach. Even though you tended not to like those sort of sounds, and certainly not coming from Joey, the whole "being eaten" experience somehow gave you a bit of perspective on life. If you were destined to stay in here forever, you might as well find a way to enjoy it.
1222.title: Sandwich Topping

12222.content:
You look around at the pink walls of your jail. It smelled horrible. There was floating chunks of chewed up sandwich floating around in the soupy digestive juices. "How am I gonna get out of here" you ask yourself as you look closely at your amulet.
You are suddenly aware that there is a dark liquid pouring into Joeys stomach. Up above Joey was finished with his lunch and is now having his beverage, a can of Pepsi. You realize what it is and remember that Joey always loved to chug his soda. After the torrent of Pepsi stopped there was a slight calm around you. "Whew I guess hes done". Not two seconds after you utter those words does your whole world start shaking. Joey was belching, and from inside his gut it felt like an earthquake.
"BUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPP" Joey belched as he sat back in his chair. He loved burping, and even though everyone told him it was gross he would not stop. He pounded on his upper chest and burped a few more times, savoring the smell that escaped from his mouth.
Meanwhile you were shook off your island of food and tossed into the acidic liquid in Joeys stomach. This was awful, what should you do?
12222.title: Joey burps some more

choices: He finds a friend to play with OR something to do
122221.content:
You slump down on the slimy creased stomach wall. There was absolutely no escape. The esophagus was far too high up while the valve to enter the intestines was to small to squeeze through. You were utterly trapped in the belly of your younger cousin. You start to wonder 'Will anyone miss me?... I wonder what mom and dad would do now that I'm gone? Probably file a missing report though the likelihood of them finding me is close to zero percent...' Thinking grimly. You look high up at the sphincter wondering what you ever did to deserve this cruel disgusting fate. More pepsi fell on your head. Making it a filthy mixture of enzymes and sticky soda. And then, to make this experience even more enjoyable, he started belching once again, the whole stomach shook and the movement of air leaving the stomach felt like a 7.0 earthquake. However, there was the fact that the 'fresh' air had left and now all you were left with was the thick humid air of rotten digested foods and the acids.

Outside, Joey continued burping. He did wonder where you were but this thought was only temporary and quickly left his mind. He suddently felt a wave of sleepiness and boredom overpower him...
122221.title: Realize there is no escape

choices: something bad for his stomach on the ground.
122222.content:
You look around trying to find a passage, an item, anything to get out. you hope that you don't exit through the digestive system. looking around you realize his throat is to high up to reach. you see the food is able to be sit down on. you are unsuccessful it looks like you will have to take the digestive route.

Joey gets up and starts to head outside for he walk. he starts to feel hungry. he starts look around for other things to eat.
122222.title: Try to escape anyway

125.content:
You always enjoyed swimming with your cousin Mike. You were both 20 years old and spent nearly every summer together.
"Heads up!" Mike shouted as he chucked a wet towel at you.
"Hey, chill out Mike!" You laughed back. Suddenly Mikes attention turned towards an amulet laying on half buried in some dirt. Puzzled, you reached to grab for it.
"Stop." Mike said holding you back. As he grabbed your arm his bare torso twisted in an unusual manner. His stomach popped out at you and nearly knocked you on your side. He was a very lean guy, mostly from swimming endlessly. "It could be dangerous. I'll go get the manager." Mike turned away and left, leaving you staring at the amulet.
"Eh, what the hell." You picked it up and toyed with it a bit. Growing bored, you walked over to your plate of nachos and started to munch it. The amulet suddenly started to glow in your hands. "What's the..." Before you knew it, you were shrunk to about the size of an inch. You flew in the air, in a free falling swoop. You screamed as you, fortunately, landed in something soft. The nachos.
"Damn...I've got to get Mikes attention somehow." You weren't too concerned about your shrinking mishap. Adrenaline was kicking in at full gear. You noticed the amulet had shrunk with you. You tucked it in your one piece suit and hoped Mike would find you soon.
Meanwhile, Mike was with manager Thomas.
"I don't get it Mike, that's the second amulet I've found this week. It keeps lighting up, but it doesn't seem to be of any effect."
"Hmmm...Well, perhaps we should get back to my cousin. You can take a look at the amulet yourself." Mike and Thomas began to walk back over to the pool area where the table and plate of nachos containing yourself were. You were, meanwhile, attempting to climb out of the nacho plate and get the approaching Mike"s attention.
"I don't get it...it was RIGHT HERE." Mike was dumbfounded. Worse yet, he couldn't seem to find his cousin. He just now noticed the plate of nachos on the table. His bare abdominal let out a low groan. Mike let out a small whine and clutched his stomach. "Hmmmm, at least she left me a snack."
"She's going to kill you dude." Thomas laughed.
"What she doesn't know can't hurt her." Mike chucked. He licked his lips and reached for the plate, where you were situated on.
125.title: Swim Meet

choices: Thomas makes him spit it out
1252.content:
You feel gravity go to work as you are lifted off the nacho plate. You watch onwards as you past Mike's thin waste, up to his lean belly, past his hardened chest, and finally, to his face. You begin to panic, jumping frantically. "Mike! Don't eat me, please!!!!"

"You are seriously going to eat that entire plate in one go?" Thomas questioned rhetorically.

"Yeah, haha, can't wait til my cousin comes back and sees that all her food is gone. I'll just say a racoon took it or what not." He shrugged. "Besides, my gut is killing me." As if on cue, he belly gave out a small gurgle. "Haven't eaten since our last race man. Been trying to cut down."

"The last thing you need to do is cut down man." Thomas poked fun at Mike by poking him in the stomach.

Meanwhile, you were listening in on Mike and Thomas' conversation. Below you, you could hear a giant rumble, which you assumed was Mike's hungry tummy. Scared now for your life, you began to muffle a cry as you continued waving your arms frantically.

"Well, bottoms up!" Mike tossed the slob of nachos into the air. You screamed violently as you were hurled through the air. You look down to see gravity kick into effect, and you began to head directly towards Mike's wide open mouth. "AHHHHHHHHHH!!!!" You screamed.

Mike caught the slob in his mouth and began to mock chew it, as Thomas look on in disgust. You sat in the mouth, awaiting the worst.
1252.title: He picks up the nacho

12521.content:
You were tossed maniacally around the mouth, being covered with saliva at every turn. Suddenly, you feel an intense force pull you backward as you are tilted towards the gaping hole that is Mike's throat. You held on desperately to any glob of nacho you could, but it was in vain.

"HEEEELP ME MIIIIIIIKE!!!!! DON"T SWALLOW ME!!!" He couldn't hear you. You are swallowed whole and alive with the nachos.

Outside, Thomas watched Mike's eyes grow wide and quickly shut as he tilted his head back and, in a mighty gulp, took the nachos down his throat. Thomas smirked as he saw the bulge sludge down the throat in a slick, wet swallow. After the lump of food finished undulating his neck and descended behind his chest, Mike let out a lengthy sigh, smiling at his food victory. He crowned a snide smirk and looked down at his six pack. "Bon appetite." He lifted his head back up and licked his lips hungrily.

"I must say, you handled that like a pro." said Thomas in partial disbelief.

Mike looked as if he was about to speak but suddenly stopped and held his bare stomach. A slight gurgle could be heard before Mike let out an exaggerated belch.

"Ahhhh...anyway, we should probably find my cousin and figure out what the deal with these amulets are. He sucked his mouth a few times to try to get all the leftover taste. Something definitely felt weird about those nachos though. Mike and Thomas started walking, but not long before another groan escaped his midsection and he stopped to clutch it.

"You alright man?"

"Yeah, but something in those nachos are not agreeing with me."
12521.title: Mike Vs His Cousin

choices: You both eat something and talk about them
You invite some friends over to see them
13.content:
"Hey cuz, lets go". You were excited to venture into the cave that you found. Anthony was your cousin, he was 10 years old and a little weird. You two grew up together and even though he was very shy he had this odd obsession with eating things that he shouldn't. He would always eat a ton of food, and you even caught him eating insects off the ground. Yeah he was weird, but he was still your little cousin.
Your name is Jake and you are a normal 16 year old boy, and today you were gonna explore a cave you found in the woods with Anthony. He reluctantly follows you into the cave and after about a half hour of "spelunking", you both find what looks like a shrine. On the shrine are two amulets, one blue and one red. You both are interested so you grab them and go back to his place.
Then...
13.title: Amulets

choices: Anthony knows how to shrink you and does so
You both remove the amulets and leave for now
132.content:
You examine the amulets with curiosity. Inscribed on the blue one in flowing gothic script was the word preserve while the red one had the word diminish in the same style. Your attention is drawn back to Anthony as he hungrily digs into the snacks you had brought to share. You might get annoyed with him if you didn’t find it strangely interesting him to watch him gobble down the savory biscuits. He smiled as he swallowed a handful with a clearly audible gulp, the bulge the food made clearly visible as it descended into the depths of his belly. He wiped his mouth of the crumbs and gave an adorable belch, launching a few crumbs which you skillfully dodged.

“Let’s try them on” Anthony said enthusiastically, all business now that he had been fed. Without waiting for a response he grabbed the red amulet and pulled it over his head. You follow suit with the blue one, but as the strange piece of jewelry touches your skin you hear a reverbing voice in you head.

“Flesh preserved and spirit intact” the strange and otherworldly voice echoed in your mind. You look across at Anthony anxiously only to see a strange look on his face.
132.title: You both eat something and talk about them

141.content:
Okay, here are your options.

Option A:

Name: Alice
Age: 9
Cousin's name: Hanna
Cousin's age: 12
Situation: Alice and Hanna have a slumber party when Hanna brings over two necklaces her grandfather gave to her for her birthday. One of them gets shrunk and gets in their cousin's stomach.

Option B:

Name: Mary
Age: 8
Cousin's name: Faith
Cousin's age: 11
Situation: Mary and Faith are playing in the backyard when two amulets mysteriously fall from the sky. One way or another, someone ends up tiny and in their cousin's stomach.

Option C:

Name: Erica
Age: 7
Cousin's name: Jessica
Cousin's age: 12, about to turn 13 in two weeks
Situation: After watching an episode of The Magic School Bus, Erica wants to see the inside of the human body in action, so she wants to go inside her cousin Jess by using the amulets her father made (her father's an inventor).

So, which one do you like?
141.title: Kids (7-12)

142.content: "Come on, I need to go!" Linda called out to her 17-yearo-old cousin, Stella. Stella and Linda were polar opposites; Linda was a raven-haired nerd, wearing a blue mid-riff & plaid skirt, and Stella was a blond, wearing a green cheerleader uniform. However, they were identical in some cases: both had DD cups, large butts, a hourglass figure and the same smile. "I just need to apply my makeup and it'll be yours." Stella replied. "You said that ten minutes ago! I need to go now!" Stella's 19 year-old cousin cried out, before barging in. Stella was about to kick Linda out, when her phone rang. Answering it, Stella's face turned to disgust and ended the call. "Our folks want us to clear out the attic. Gah!" Stella complains. "S-ser-riously?" Linda stutters. Both girls never did like going to the attic, feeling there's something creepy waiting for them. "Let's get this done with. The longer we stall, the more we to clean, okay?" Stella says with an annoyed tone. Once they finished their business, the girls head up towards the attic. The attic was a small room, filled with must, memories, dust, and broken things. Like the railway Linda was leaning on, as it fell. Linda squeaked as she fell and had several boxes fall on her. "I better see if she's, or else the family is going to think I murdered the nerd." Stella sighs, before walking where her cousin. Yet, Linda did not need any help as she got up, holding a strange box. Curiosity taking over, Linda opens the box and gasps. Stella, wondering what her was looking at, walks over to her and looks inside. In the box, was two identical, yet, most beautiful necklaces, making the Hope Diamond put to shame. One difference between the necklaces, was one of them was blue and the other was red. "No way we're putting this stuff on EBay." Linda spoke, as she broke the silence around the girls.
142.title: The nerd and the cheerleader

choices: Stella finds Linda in her cereal..
1421.content: Stella got the shrinking amulet (blue one) and Linda got the indestructible (red) one. They went back downstairs after they were done to eat breakfast. Stella poured herself a bowl of cereal and had to use the bathroom, so she set her necklace down on the counter and went to the bathroom before eating. Linda on the other hand didn't get to see the other necklace very well so she picked it up to examine it. Out of no where, Linda was blinded and now freed selling from the air. She landed in a wet substance that smelled like honey. Linda started to realize her surroundings and noticed she shrank really small. She then figured out she was in a bowl of cereal, Stella's cereal. She was smaller than the Cheerios that surrounded her. Linda was panicking when suddenly the ground started to shake and Stella was returning. "Linda where did you go now? We're not done cleaning so you better come out!" Stella did not know that her cousin was about to be her meal unknowingly...
1421.title: Stella gets the blue amulet

14212.content:
Stella absentmindedly ate the cereal as Linda squealed loudly from her new location. After breakfast, Stella got up to clean the house and walks around inspecting the undusted corners of the house. This was very confusing, where is Linda after all? "Linda, you better get here right this instant!" Stella looked around warily as she wonders why Linda hasn't cleaned the house yet. Stella did however find Linda's shoe in the cereal, but thought it was a doll's shoe.

Suddenly Stella bent over as she seems to be having some indigestion right about now, "Not now, what is it this time?!" she screamed as she heard a squeaking noise amidst the loud growls and gurgles. "I can't hear you?"
14212.title: Stella finds Linda in her cereal..

142122.content: "Oh my gosh I swallowed Linda! What will I do?"
142122.title: Stella realises it was Linda

choices: It's actually the other way round (Cousin is Stephanie and Angelique is the mai)
143.content: You are Stephanie and your cousin is Angelique
143.title: Adults (+21)

info.brief_description: You are swallowed by your cousin, but you do not digest
info.description: You and your cousin find two amulets, yours makes you indestructible, and hers/his gives the ability to shrink people. You wind up getting swallowed but you are not harmed. Now you live in your cousins stomach.
info.pretty_title: Living in the stomach of your cousin
